input.title: High Risk: Azure Key Vaults with Open Network Access (AZ-003)
input.body:
# Azure Key Vault Open Network Access Risk (AZ-003)

## Description
Multiple Key Vaults have open network access, which poses a high security risk.

Affected Vaults:
- ai-empire-vault-01
- seobaike-vault

## Recommended Fix
- Restrict network access using Virtual Network service endpoints or Private Link.
- Enable firewall rules to allow only trusted IPs or subnets.

## Priority
High

Please assign to Azure admin for manual resolution.

input.title: Medium Risk: Azure AI Services with Public Network Access (AZ-004)
input.body:
# Azure AI Services Public Network Access Risk (AZ-004)

## Description
Multiple AI services have public network access enabled, which is a medium security risk.

Affected Services:
- ai-empire-openai-australiaeast
- ai-empire-openai-eastus
- ai-empire-openai-japaneast
- ai-empire-openai-southeastasia
- ai-empire-openai-swedencentral
- ai-empire-openai-uksouth
- ai-empire-openai-westeurope
- ai-empire-openai-westus

## Recommended Fix
- Disable public network access and use private endpoints.
- Configure network security groups or firewalls as needed.

## Priority
Medium

Assign to Azure team for review and fix.

input.title: High Risk: GitHub Repository Set to Public (GH-001)
input.body:
# GitHub Repository Public Visibility Risk (GH-001)

## Description
The repository is set to public, exposing source code which is a high security risk.

## Recommended Fix
- Change repository visibility to private.
- Review and remove any sensitive information if already exposed.
- Ensure only authorized users have access.

## Priority
High

Please assign to GitHub admin for immediate action.
